freelancer_platform_app.api package

freelancer_platform_app.api.filters module

class freelancer_platform_app.api.filters.OfferFilter(data=None, queryset=None, *, request=None, prefix=None)

Bases: FilterSet

Custom filter class for filtering offers based on various criteria.

Filters:

  • creator_id: Filters offers by the ID of the user who created them.

  • min_price: Filters offers where the minimum price of their details is less than or equal to a specified value.

  • max_delivery_time: Filters offers where the maximum delivery time of their details is less than or equal to a specified value.

class Meta

Bases: object

fields = ['creator_id', 'min_price', 'max_delivery_time']
model

alias of Offer

base_filters = {'creator_id': <django_filters.filters.NumberFilter object>, 'max_delivery_time': <django_filters.filters.NumberFilter object>, 'min_price': <django_filters.filters.NumberFilter object>}
declared_filters = {'creator_id': <django_filters.filters.NumberFilter object>, 'max_delivery_time': <django_filters.filters.NumberFilter object>, 'min_price': <django_filters.filters.NumberFilter object>}
filter_max_delivery_time(queryset, name, value)

Filters the queryset to include offers with at least one detail having a delivery time less than or equal to the specified value.

filter_min_price(queryset, name, value)

Filters the queryset to include offers with at least one detail having a price less than or equal to the specified value.

freelancer_platform_app.api.pagination module

class freelancer_platform_app.api.pagination.OfferPagination

Bases: PageNumberPagination

Custom pagination class for paginating offers.

Attributes:

  • page_size: Default number of offers per page.

  • page_size_query_param: Query parameter name for customizing the page size.

  • max_page_size: Maximum number of offers allowed per page.

max_page_size = 12
page_size = 6
page_size_query_param = 'page_size'

to_representation(instance)

Customizes the representation of the Offer model. Adds user details and minimum price/delivery time for GET requests.

update(instance, validated_data)

Updates an offer, including nested details if provided. Matches details based on their ‘offer_type’.

class freelancer_platform_app.api.serializers.OfferSerializer(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: ModelSerializer

Serializer for Offer model. Handles serialization of offer details and additional fields like minimum price and delivery time.

class Meta

Bases: object

fields = ['id', 'user', 'title', 'image', 'description', 'created_at', 'updated_at', 'details']
model

alias of Offer

read_only_fields = ['user', 'created_at', 'updated_at', 'min_price', 'min_delivery_time']
create(validated_data)

Creates a new offer along with its details. Associates the offer with the current user.

to_representation(instance)

Customizes the representation of the Offer model. Adds user details, hyperlinked details, and minimum price/delivery time for GET requests.

validate(attrs)

Validates that the offer contains exactly three details with the required types: ‘basic’, ‘standard’, and ‘premium’.

class freelancer_platform_app.api.serializers.OrderSerializer(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: ModelSerializer

Serializer for Order model. Adds a method field for the business user and restricts writable fields to essential attributes for order creation.

create(validated_data)

Creates a new order for the current user based on the selected offer detail.

get_business_user(obj)

Returns the ID of the business user associated with the order.

class freelancer_platform_app.api.views.OfferDetailView(**kwargs)

Bases: RetrieveUpdateDestroyAPIView

Handles retrieving, updating, and deleting specific offers. Applies dynamic permissions based on the request method.

authentication_classes = [<class 'rest_framework.authentication.TokenAuthentication'>]
destroy(request, *args, **kwargs)

Deletes the specified offer and returns a success response.

get_permissions()

Dynamically sets permissions: - GET: Accessible to everyone. - PUT: Forbidden. - PATCH/DELETE: Restricted to admins and owners.

class freelancer_platform_app.api.views.OfferListView(**kwargs)

Bases: ListCreateAPIView

Handles listing and creating offers. Supports filtering, searching, and pagination. Different permissions are applied based on the request method.

class freelancer_platform_app.api.views.OrderViewSet(**kwargs)

Bases: ModelViewSet

Manages orders, including listing, creating, and updating them. Filters accessible orders based on the user’s role (customer or business user).

authentication_classes = [<class 'rest_framework.authentication.TokenAuthentication'>]
basename = None
description = None
destroy(request, *args, **kwargs)

Deletes the specified order and returns a success response.

detail = None
get_permissions()

Dynamically sets permissions based on the request method. - GET: Requires authentication. - POST: Restricted to admins and customer users. - PUT: Forbidden. - PATCH: Restricted to admins and owners. - DELETE: Restricted to admins.

get_queryset()

Returns orders relevant to the requesting user. - Superusers see all orders. - Customers and business users see orders they are involved in.

name = None
permission_classes = []

class freelancer_platform_app.api.views.ReviewViewSet(**kwargs)

Bases: ModelViewSet

Handles listing, creating, updating, and deleting reviews. Supports filtering by business user and reviewer, and ordering by date or rating.

get_permissions()

Dynamically sets permissions based on the request method. - GET: Requires authentication. - POST: Restricted to admins and customer users. - PUT: Forbidden. - PATCH: Restricted to admins and owners. - DELETE: Restricted to staff and owners.
